data.name: Jump Movement
data.detailed_description:
A hardcore 2D platformer with a minimalistic design and pleasing graphics.
You can only move left and right while jumping until you hit the ground. In each location you have 6 rooms with many obstacles on your way to the finish line.
In total there are 5 locations and 5 levels of difficulty - 25 combinations in total - try to pass each of them in the minimum time.
Can you do it? Doesn't sound too hard? Then good luck, and try not to smash your keyboard :)
data.about_the_game:
A hardcore 2D platformer with a minimalistic design and pleasing graphics.
You can only move left and right while jumping until you hit the ground. In each location you have 6 rooms with many obstacles on your way to the finish line.
In total there are 5 locations and 5 levels of difficulty - 25 combinations in total - try to pass each of them in the minimum time.
Can you do it? Doesn't sound too hard? Then good luck, and try not to smash your keyboard :)
data.short_description: Hardcore 2D platformer with a minimalistic design. You can only move left and right while jumping. You have many obstacles to overcome on your way to the finish line. With 5 locations and 5 levels of difficulty - 25 combinations in total - try to pass them all. Can you do it?
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1050 2GB or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
